Jasa Marga Kaji Cara Bayar Tol Pakai QR Code
05 Nov 2019, 13:30 by Herdi Alif Alhikam


PT Jasa Marga (Persero) Tbk/Foto: Ari Saputra

Jakarta - PT Jasa Marga (Persero) Tbk sedang mengkaji pembayaran jalan tol dengan QR Code. Hal ini dilakukan untuk mempercepat transaksi di setiap gate alias gerbang tol."QR code itu juga alternatifnya itu cukup handphone aja, ini potensialnya banyak lagi teknologinya," tutur Direktur Keuangan Jasa Marga, Donny Arsal dalam acara konferensi pers di Hotel Mulia, Jakarta, Selasa (5/11/2019).Donny menjelaskan rencana pengembangan QR code seiring dengan integrasi ruas tol Jakarta-Tangerang. Selain itu juga akan menggandeng pihak profesional dari dalam maupun luar negeri."Dengan adanya integrasi ruas tol Jakarta-Tangerang, kantor cabang Tangerang kosong, nah kita mau kembangkan IoT (Internet of Things) di Tangerang. Itu akan kita kembangkan sistem pembayaran QR code, kita hire darii luar dan dalam negeri untuk kembangkan IoT pembayaran tol," terang Donny.Selain QR Code, menurut Donny Jasa Marga akan uji coba teknologi pembayaran melalui On Board Unit (OBU) maupun dengan stiker khusus. Teknologi ini akan memudahkan pengendara membayar tol tanpa perlu membuka jendela mobil lagi.Namun, Donny menegaskan, penggunaan teknologi ini bisa sepenuhnya jalan setelah mendapat restu pemerintah."Ke depannya mungkin akan tidak tap lagi kemungkinan akan ada stiker. Stiker jadi kita tempel di headlamp misalnya, atau bagian depan mobil kemudian ada reader yang baca stikernya nanti terbuka gate-nya. Jadi nggak usah buka jendela lagi, apalagi kalau hujan. Bisa juga pakai OBU yang kecil, yang penting kita perlu dapat izin penggunaan teknologi baru," tutur Donny. Simak Video " Menilik Jalan Tol Pertama di Kalimantan"[Gambas:Video 20detik](zlf/zlf)

Jasa Marga Reviews How to Pay Toll for Using QR Code
05 Nov 2019, 13:30 by Herdi Alif Alhikam


PT Jasa Marga (Persero) Tbk / Photo: Ari Saputra

Jakarta - PT Jasa Marga (Persero) Tbk is reviewing toll road payments using the QR Code. This is done to accelerate transactions at each gate, aka the toll gate. "The QR code is also an alternative, it is enough for mobile phones, this has the potential for much more technology," said Jasa Marga Finance Director Donny Arsal in a press conference at Hotel Mulia, Jakarta, Tuesday (5/11/2019). Donny explained the plan to develop QR code along with the integration of the Jakarta-Tangerang toll road section. It will also engage with domestic and international professionals. "With the integration of the Jakarta-Tangerang toll road, the Tangerang branch office is empty, now we want to develop IoT (Internet of Things) in Tangerang. We will develop a QR code payment system, we hire from abroad and within the country to develop IoT toll payments, "explained Donny. In addition to the QR Code, according to Donny Jasa Marga, we will test payment technology through the On Board Unit (OBU) or with special stickers. This technology will make it easier for motorists to pay tolls without the need to open the car window again. However, Donny asserted, the use of this technology can be fully operational after receiving government approval. "Going forward, it may not tap again the possibility of stickers. Sticker so we stick it on the headlamp for example "Or the front of the car, then there is a reader who reads the sticker and then opens the gate. So we don't need to open the window again, especially if it rains. It can also use a small OBU, as long as we need to get permission to use new technology," Donny said.
